scenes.name: The Azure Lounge
scenes.description: You stand in a spacious lounge bathed in shades of azure. Plush seating and abstract art fill the room, creating a tranquil atmosphere. The scent of old books drifts in from the east, and a warm, earthy aroma beckons from the south.

options.description: Go east to The Grand Library.
Go south to The Conservatory.

scenes.name: The Grand Library
scenes.description: Books from floor to ceiling, the grand library exudes wisdom and age. Ladders slide along the shelves, and a large globe sits in the center. Passages lead to the west, east, and south.

options.description: Go west to The Azure Lounge.
Go east to The Silent Gallery.
Go south to The Dining Hall.

scenes.name: The Silent Gallery
scenes.description: The gallery is quiet, the walls adorned with monochrome photographs and paintings. Soft lighting highlights each piece. Doorways lead west and south.

options.description: Go west to The Grand Library.
Go south to The Game Room.

scenes.name: The Sunroom
scenes.description: A radiant room filled with sunlight, lush plants, and comfortable seating. Large windows offer a view of the sky, and the only exit leads south.

options.description: Go south to The Observatory.

scenes.name: The Conservatory
scenes.description: Surrounded by glass walls, the conservatory houses exotic plants and flowers. A small fountain murmurs in the background. Doors lead north, east, and south.

options.description: Go north to The Azure Lounge.
Go east to The Dining Hall.
Go south to The Stone Garden.

scenes.name: The Dining Hall
scenes.description: A grand hall with a long table set for a feast. Paintings of bountiful harvests cover the walls. There are exits to the west, north, and south.

options.description: Go west to The Conservatory.
Go north to The Grand Library.
Go south to The Wine Cellar.

scenes.name: The Observatory
scenes.description: You stand in The Observatory, surrounded by telescopes and star charts. The room smells of old books and the vast universe seems within your grasp.

options.description: Go north to The Sunroom.
Go south to The Secret Study.

scenes.name: The Workshop
scenes.description: The Workshop is cluttered with tools and unfinished projects. The scent of sawdust and oil permeates the air, a testament to the many hours of craftsmanship spent here.

options.description: Go north to The Conservatory.
Go east to The Armory.

scenes.name: The Armory
scenes.description: The Armory's walls are lined with ancient weaponry and armor. The air holds an iron tang, and each piece tells a story of battles long past.

options.description: Go west to The Workshop.
Go east to The Zen Garden.
Go north to The Dining Hall.

scenes.name: The Zen Garden
scenes.description: The Zen Garden is a tranquil space of raked sand and precisely placed stones. The gentle trickle of a bamboo water feature invites contemplation.

options.description: Go west to The Armory.
Go south to The Secret Study (accessible via Zen Garden).
Go north to The Game Room.

scenes.name: The Secret Study
scenes.description: This Secret Study is a haven for the intellectually curious, filled with obscure texts and mysterious artifacts.

options.description: Go north to The Observatory.
Go east to The Secret Study (accessible via Zen Garden).

scenes.name: The Game Room
scenes.description: The Game Room is alive with the sounds of laughter and competition. Various gaming tables and paraphernalia offer a respite from adventure.

options.description: Go south to The Zen Garden.
Go east to The Gallery.

scenes.name: The Vault
scenes.description: The air is cool and metallic here in the Vault, surrounded by thick walls and a heavy door that lies ajar to the east.

options.description: Go east to The Alchemy Lab.

scenes.name: The Alchemy Lab
scenes.description: Bubbling potions and mystical symbols abound in the Alchemy Lab. Exits lead west back to The Vault and south to The Enchanted Chamber.

options.description: Go west to The Vault.
Go south to The Enchanted Chamber.

scenes.name: The Secret Study (accessible via Zen Garden)
scenes.description: Secrets of the past whisper from the book-laden shelves of this hidden study. A hidden door leads south to The Enchanted Chamber, another west to The Secret Study.

options.description: Go north to The Zen Garden.
Go west to The Secret Study.
Go south to The Enchanted Chamber.

scenes.name: The Enchanted Chamber (accessible via Secret Study)
scenes.description: Magic permeates the air in the Enchanted Chamber, filled with otherworldly plants and glowing stones. The only exit is north back to The Secret Study.

options.description: Go north to The Secret Study (accessible via Zen Garden).
